section.title: PartOfSpeech object type
section.para: Any of the word classes to which a lexical item may be assigned, e.g. noun, verb, adjective, etc.

listitem.para: Can be constrained and mapped to external authorities by the DMLex Controlled Vocabularies Module.
Can be implicit from the serialization.

note.para: If you want to model other grammatical properties of the headword besides part of speech, such as gender (of nouns) or aspect (of verbs), the recommended way to do that in DMLex is to conflate them to the part-of-speech label, for example "masculine noun" and "feminine noun", or "perfective verb" and "imperfective verb".
